paintings.painting2: It was born at the beginning of the 20th century and was completely radical for its time
paintings.painting3: The main purpose of abstraction in art is not to tell a story, but to encourage involvement and imagination
paintings.painting4: Abstract artists use a variety of techniques to create their work, mixing traditional means with more experimental ideas

home.abstract_art_description: Abstract art is a broad genre that emerged in the early 20th century, moving away from traditional forms to express emotions and ideas through non-representational shapes, colors, and textures. It includes styles like geometric abstraction, gestural painting, and color field art, all focused on simplifying forms and exploring the emotional impact of color and design.
home.about_me_description: I’m Egle, a sensitive and creative woman. Though I once believed I wasn’t suited for art, after a deep personal loss, I turned to art therapy. It transformed my life, filling my home with paintings and inspiring me to share my work with the world.
home.art_voice: “Art has a voice - let it speak.” ― Rochelle Carr

home.title: Abstract Art Gallery | Buy Acrylic Paintings
home.description: Explore our collection of abstract acrylic paintings. Unique and original art pieces for your home or office decor.
home.keywords: abstract art, acrylic paintings, art for sale, modern art, unique art pieces
